ItemTemplate.Name: Localization file (NET Core, C#, ResX)
ItemTemplate.Description:
Localization HQ file (*.lhq) with T4 template which generates c# (*.cs) and resource (*.resx) file(s).
C# file(s) are generated for NET.Core projects with ASP.NET Core Dependency Injection.
Recommended target projects: .NET Core (ASP.NET, Console, Library)

ItemTemplate.Name: Localization file (NET Core, C#, ResX)
ItemTemplate.Description:
Localization HQ file (*.lhq) with T4 template which generates c# (*.cs) and resource (*.resx) file(s).
C# file(s) are generated for NET.Core projects with ASP.NET Core Dependency Injection.
Recommended target projects: .NET Core (ASP.NET, Console, Library)

ItemTemplate.Name: Localization file (NET Framework, C#, ResX)
ItemTemplate.Description:
Localization HQ file (*.lhq) with T4 template which generates c# (*.cs) and resource (*.resx) file(s).
C# file(s) are generated for classic NET Framework projects.
Recommended target projects: All classic NET Framework projects (except WPF)

ItemTemplate.Name: Localization file for Typescript applications
ItemTemplate.Description:
Localization HQ file (*.lhq) with T4 template which generates JSON file to be consumed by javascript with typescript (*.d.ts) type definition.
Recommended target projects: Any web application project.

ItemTemplate.Name: Localization file for Windows Forms (NET Framework, C#, ResX)
ItemTemplate.Description:
Localization HQ file (*.lhq) with T4 template which generates c# (*.cs) and resource (*.resx) file(s).
C# file(s) are generated for classic NET Framework (not NET Core).
Recommended target projects: Classic Windows Forms NET Framework project.

ItemTemplate.Name: Localization file for WPF (NET Framework, C#, ResX)
ItemTemplate.Description:
Localization HQ file (*.lhq) with T4 template which generates c# (*.cs) and resource (*.resx) file(s).
C# file(s) are generated for classic NET Framework.
Recommended target projects: Classic NET Framework WPF project.
